titleStmt.title: Letter of advice sent to the lord chancellors lady concerning His Lordships being taken at Rope and Anchor Ally in Wapping.
titleStmt.author: A. O.

notesStmt.note: Satire on the behavior of Justice George Jeffreys during the revolution of 1688.
Signed at end of sheet: A.O.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
